@usedefaults
{{timestamp}}

@block

@row
@col 4
{{actions:
- display: go to shell
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/shell

- display: Reload all Services
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/reload
  showresponse: True

- display: Execute blueprint
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/executeBlueprint
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: init
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/init
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    label: Force init
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: install
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/install
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    label: Force install
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: async
    label: Async
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: True
      value: True
    - label: False
      value: False
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Execute Action
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/executeAction
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: action
    type: text
    label: action name
    placeholder: 'install'
    required: True
  - name: force
    label: Force install
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Delete service
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/deleteService
  showresponse: True
  input:
    - name: repository
      type: hidden
      value: $$repo
    - name: role
      type: text
      label: Role
      value: ''
      required: True
    - name: instance
      type: text
      label: Instance
      value: ''
      required: True

- display: commit
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/commit

}}

* [Simulator|cockpit/AYSRepo/simulate?repo=$$repo]
